title: POAP Kiosk
subtitle: Get POAPs to your friends IRL

health.maintenance:
NL The POAP system is undergoing some maintenance, the POAP Kiosk might not work as expected during this time.

Please check our official channels for details.

preCodes.title: Upload your mint links to your POAP kiosk

dropName.label: Kiosk title
dropName.info: For your own reference, not visible to the world.

dropDate.label: Kiosk expiry date
dropDate.info:
After this date in your local timezone, your POAP Kiosk will stop working

⚠️ You can only schedule up to 30 days in advance.

dropEmail.label: Your email
dropEmail.info: We will send the POAP Kiosk link and the admin link there.

dropGame.label: Enable anti-farming game?
dropGame.info:
Especially online events tend to attract malicious POAP farmers (people who just show up to get as many POAPs as they can without being useful participants).

Enabling this setting will force your participants to play a minigame for a minute before being given a POAP.

dropCss.label: Custom CSS overrides
dropCss.info: This field will be injected as CSS overrides during the claiming process.

dropBaseurl.label: POAP Claim Baseurl Override
dropBaseurl.info: Instead of redirecting to the POAP interface to claim a POAP, redirect it to any URL of your choosing.

dropCollectEmails.label: Collect emails?
dropCollectEmails.info: This assumed you set up the email collection system. This requires manual approval, if you don't know what this is you should not touch it.

file.codeFormat: codes had an invalid format. Example of a malformed code:

event.eventExpired: This event appears to have expired!
event.noEmail: Please specify a valid email address
event.wrongDate: Please specify the date in YYYY-MM-DD, for example 2021-11-25

gameTime.label: How many seconds should the anti-farming game last?
gameTime.info: The longer you set this, the harder it becomes for humans to farm your POAP drop

input.label: Select .txt file that contains your POAP mint links
input.info: This is the .txt file you received via email after you created your POAP drop at https://app.poap.xyz/admin
